name: A (W)Hole Expedition
description:
An entry for the https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-3 Game Jam.

While I can't say I'm perfectly happy with the end result. I can say that I would like to return to this game, refine it, expand it, and make it more... game like.

The game is simple, but I feel it did the job I wanted it to do fairly well. It was a fun project.

Update: I didn't realize there was so much time left. I'm hoping to get a good updated version of the game out, maybe with sound and such.
